thread.title: Test the Quality of a Suit Jacket In 30 Seconds
thread.title_full: Test the Quality of a Suit Jacket In 30 Seconds

author: Patrick Allan
title: Test the Quality of a Suit Jacket In 30 Seconds
text:
Whether you’re thumbing the racks of suits at a thrift shop or sifting through a going out of business sale, you’ll be better off knowing how to identify quality jackets fast. Advertisement 
This graphic, from Ted Slampyak and The Art of Manliness , features seven tips from the Indispensable Guide to Classic Men’s Clothing you can use to quickly tell the quality of a suit. For example, checking the material the jacket’s buttons are made of, seeing if the coat lining is silk or rayon, and making sure the pockets lie neat and flat. You can check out all seven tips in the graphic below.
